Title: Relates to real property tax exemptions for any special ad valorem levies or special district charges and assessments for veterans
Summary: Authorizes up to one hundred percent real property tax exemptions for any special ad valorem levies or special district charges and assessments for veterans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to real property tax exemptions for any special ad valorem levies or special district charges and assessments for veterans
